meanings.definition: The amount that a thimble can hold.
meanings.sent1: She poured a thimblesful of water into the tiny cup.
meanings.sent2: Grandma always measured the medicine in thimblesful to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The ants had a party with a thimblesful of sugar they found.
meanings.sent4: His heart was filled with a thimblesful of joy when he saw her smile.
meanings.sent5: The tiny bird drank a thimblesful of nectar from the flower.
